description: Arousal with revulsion - sexual disgust conflict where the body responds while the mind recoils.
actor_description: My body betrays me. Heat rises anyway—breath thickening, skin too aware—while my stomach turns with disgust at the fact that it's happening. I want to shove the feeling out of myself, to scrub it off, but it clings. The conflict makes me angry. It makes me ashamed. Mostly it makes me sick.
description_text: {actor}'s face tightens with open revulsion even as their breathing turns heavy; a sharp, angry grimace fights with an unwanted flush, as if their body is responding to something their mind rejects.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: I hear a harsh exhale through the nose—almost a snarl—followed by breathing that's too deep and unsteady to hide.
alternate_descriptions.tactile: The air around {actor} feels tense and hot at once—like recoil and pull happening in the same instant.
